name: jhoshi-prowrestling-news-batch
description: 女子プロレスニュース収集バッチ処理

scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.deploy: func azure functionapp publish func-jhoshi-news --build remote
scripts.deploy:local: npm run build && func azure functionapp publish func-jhoshi-news
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Installing Puppeteer Chrome...' && npx puppeteer browsers install chrome || echo 'Chrome installation completed with warnings'
